documentUploadExample.upload_a_document_image_to_see_2: Ngarkoni një imazh të dokumentit për ta parë 2

welcome.firstTime: Hello! I'm here to help you organize everything important for your family. We'll take this step by step, and you can go at your own pace.
welcome.returning: Welcome back! Let's continue preparing your family's future. You're making great progress.
welcome.afterBreak: It's good to see you again. Taking breaks is completely normal - this is important work that deserves your time and attention.

dashboard.empty: I've prepared some suggestions based on what you told us. Let's start with what will help your family most.
dashboard.progress: You're doing great! Your family is already much better prepared than when you started.
dashboard.nearComplete: You're almost there! Your family will have everything they need to feel confident and prepared.

assets.firstAsset: Let's start by telling me about something really important to your family - maybe your home or a significant account.
assets.addingMore: Great! Each thing you add makes it easier for your family to understand what matters to you.
assets.organizing: I can see you're building a clear picture for your family. This organization will mean so much to them.

family.noTrustedPeople: Now let's think about the people who could help your family if they needed it. Who would you trust to step in?
family.addingPeople: It's wonderful that you have people you can count on. Your family will feel so much more supported.
family.definingRoles: Helping people understand how they can help is such a thoughtful thing to do.

documents.firstUpload: Let's get your most important documents organized so your family can find them easily.
documents.organizing: You're creating such a clear system. Your family won't have to guess where anything is.
documents.categorizing: This organization will save your family so much time and stress when they need these documents.

will.starting: Creating a will shows how much you care about your family's future. I'll guide you through each decision.
will.inProgress: These are important decisions, and it's normal to take your time thinking them through.
will.reviewing: You've made thoughtful choices. Your family will understand exactly what you wanted.

overwhelmed.message: This can feel like a lot to think about. That's completely normal - you're dealing with important, emotional topics.
overwhelmed.suggestion: Would you like to take a break, or shall we focus on just one small thing today?
overwhelmed.reassurance: Remember, you don't have to do everything at once. Every small step helps your family.

procrastinating.message: I notice it's been a while since your last visit. Life gets busy, and thinking about these topics isn't always easy.
procrastinating.suggestion: Would you like to spend just 5 minutes on something simple today?
procrastinating.encouragement: Even small progress is meaningful progress for your family.

accomplished.message: Look at everything you've accomplished! Your family is so much better prepared because of the work you've done.
accomplished.celebration: You should feel proud of taking these important steps to protect your loved ones.
accomplished.nextSteps: When you're ready, I have some ideas for what might help your family even more.

priorities.high: This is one of the most important things for your family to know about.
priorities.medium: This will definitely help your family, and it's worth doing when you have time.
priorities.low: This is nice to have organized, but don't worry if you want to focus on other things first.

timeEstimates.quick: This should only take a few minutes.
timeEstimates.moderate: This might take 10-15 minutes, but it's worth the time.
timeEstimates.involved: This is more involved, but you can save your progress and come back to it.

familyBenefit.immediate: Your family will be able to use this information right away if they need it.
familyBenefit.planning: This helps your family plan and make decisions more easily.
familyBenefit.peace: This gives your family confidence that they understand your wishes.

smart.basedOnAnswers: Based on what you told me about your situation, I think your family would really benefit from this.
smart.basedOnProgress: Since you've been working on {{area}}, this would be a natural next step.
smart.basedOnTime: You mentioned time is limited, so I've prioritized what will help your family most.

encouraging.smallStep: This is a small step that will make a big difference for your family.
encouraging.buildingOn: This builds on the great work you've already done.
encouraging.almostThere: You're so close to having this area completely organized for your family.
